text:
@JoeBiden #Governors were told directly to slow testing by #Trump. 
Dr. #Fauci was not instructed to slow #COVID testing. 
Re: Trump Statement~Tulsa Oklahoma. 
White House is no longer doing testing. 
Governors now conduct #TestingFailure (we wait in car lines 8-10 hours) #Arizona #COVID19
